title: ICE (beta 2018-04-19) in cache: `thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 32457 but the index is 32459', /checkout/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs:871:14`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
First, the backtrace:
```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 32457 but the index is 32459', /checkout/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs:871:14
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::print
   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
   3: std::panicking::default_hook
   4: core::ops::function::Fn::call
   5: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
   6: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
   7: rust_begin_unwind
   8: core::panicking::panic_fmt
   9: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check
  10: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl
  11: rustc_errors::Handler::track_diagnostics
  12: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::cycle_check
  13: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::output_filenames<'tcx>>::force
  14: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::output_filenames<'tcx>>::try_get
  15: rustc::ty::maps::TyCtxtAt::output_filenames
  16: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'tcx, 'lcx>>::output_filenames
  17: rustc_trans::back::write::start_async_translation
  18: rustc_trans::base::trans_crate
  19: <rustc_trans::LlvmTransCrate as rustc_trans_utils::trans_crate::TransCrate>::trans_crate
  20: rustc::util::common::time
  21: rustc_driver::driver::phase_4_translate_to_llvm
  22: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input::{{closure}}
  23: <std::thread::local::LocalKey<T>>::with
  24: <std::thread::local::LocalKey<T>>::with
  25: rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt::create_and_enter
  26: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  27: rustc_driver::run_compiler_impl
  28: syntax::with_globals
```

The issue can be replicated by downloading [this archive](https://ekleog.org/rust-dump/VGSGp1Ui40r0gg3Vkx4Qsg.tgz), unpacking it in an empty directory, and running `cargo build` with rustc 1.26.0-beta.7 (842323097 2018-04-19). It reproduces only with this specific target directory, though it should continue to reproduce if you build several times.

If somehow you can't replicate the issue, you can install nix, run `nix-shell --pure shell.nix` with [this shell.nix](https://github.com/Ekleog/yuubind/blob/e824ec587bd7a49fa5d8f5cca5b90d3059c10e30/shell.nix), and inside this (really limited, as it contains basically only bash and cargo/rustc) shell run `cargo build`, this should place you in exactly the same build environment as mine. :)
